-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Provides Persistent instances to Facebook types.
--   
@package fb-persistent
@version 0.3.5


-- | This package is meant to be imported as
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Facebook.Persistent ()
--   </pre>
--   
--   because it doesn't export any symbols. However, it exports the
--   following orphan instances:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance <a>PersistField</a> <a>Action</a>          -- since 0.1
--   instance <a>PersistField</a> <a>Id</a>              -- since 0.1.2
--   instance <a>PersistField</a> <a>AppAccessToken</a>  -- since 0.1.3
--   instance <a>PersistField</a> <a>UserAccessToken</a> -- since 0.1.3
--   </pre>
module Facebook.Persistent
instance AccessTokenKind AppKind
instance AccessTokenKind UserKind
instance AccessTokenKind kind => PersistFieldSql (AccessToken kind)
instance AccessTokenKind kind => PersistField (AccessToken kind)
instance PersistFieldSql Id
instance PersistField Id
instance PersistFieldSql Action
instance PersistField Action
